CHANGELOG
=========

0.2.0 (2013-09-XX)
------------------

* Added optional C extension for using libmaxminddb in place of the pure PHP
  reader.
* Significantly improved error handling in pure PHP reader.
* Improved performance for IPv4 lookups in an IPv6 database.

0.1.0 (2013-07-16)
------------------

* Initial release
